 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתָה‎</span> **verb** ==come== (in Hebrew only poetry) (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אתו‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG 1875, 597; 1888, 343</sup>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Deut.33.2|Deut 33:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתָא‎</span> [[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]] see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75»§ 75</sup> R. 22; 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתָנוּ‎</span> [[Jer.3.22|Jer 3:22]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶאֱתֶה‎</span> [[Job.37.22|Job 37:22]]; [[Prov.1.27|Prov 1:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּתֵא‎</span> [[Deut.33.21|Deut 33:21]] (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶּאֱתֶה‎</span> compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 577</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּאת‎</span> [[Isa.41.25|Isa 41:25]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶּאֱתָיֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.3.25|Job 3:25]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּאתֶה‎</span> [[Mic.4.3|Mic 4:3]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶאֱתָ֫יוּ‎</span> [[Job.16.22|Job 16:22]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶּאֱתָיוּ֑ן‎</span> [[Isa.41.5|Isa 41:5]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵתָ֫יוּ‎</span> [[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]] + 2 t.; ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹתִיּוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.41.23|Isa 41:23]] + 2 t.; — ***come***, of men [[Deut.33.21|Deut 33:21]]; [[Ps.68.32|Ps 68:32]]; [[Isa.41.25|Isa 41:25]]; [[Isa.56.12|Isa 56:12]] ***Imperative = come now***, with hostile purpose [[Job.30.14|Job 30:14]], of men unto <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Jer.3.22|Jer 3:22]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>) compare [[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Deut.33.2|Deut 33:2]] of ends of earth, etc., personified [[Isa.41.5|Isa 41:5]] of time, morning [[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]], years [[Job.16.22|Job 16:22]] of weather [[Job.37.22|Job 37:22]] of beasts, to devour [[Isa.56.9|Isa 56:9]] (followed by infinitive), of calamity [[Prov.1.27|Prov 1:27]]; [[Job.3.25|Job 3:25]] ***come upon***, with suffix, of dominion [[Mic.4.8|Mic 4:8]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span>). ***Participle*** plural feminine as substantive ***things to come***, future things [[Isa.41.23|Isa 41:23]]; [[Isa.44.7|Isa 44:7]]; [[Isa.45.11|Isa 45:11]]. **Hiph\`il** ***bring, Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵתָ֫יוּ מַיִם‎</span> [[Isa.21.14|Isa 21:14]] ***bring water*** (on form, for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶאֱתוּ‎</span> compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 141 a</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:68»§ 68</sup>, 2 R. 1); [[Jer.12.9|Jer 12:9]] ***bring beasts***, to devour.
